deadCells:Rob.NAME: Pillage

deadCells:InTime.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if any enemy intends to attack, play !M! random *shield cards.

deadCells:FranticSword.NAME: Frantic Sword
deadCells:FranticSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are below 50% HP, deal !HD! damage instead.

deadCells:ClusterGrenade.NAME: Cluster Grenade

deadCells:LaceratingAura.NAME: Lacerating Aura

deadCells:Reckless.NAME: Reckless
deadCells:Reckless.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! random *Attacks from your draw pile and Exhaust them. NL Exhaust.

deadCells:CorrosiveCloud.NAME: Corrosive Cloud
deadCells:CorrosiveCloud.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply 3 or more Bleeding, apply !M! Poison for every 3 Bleeding.
deadCells:CorrosiveCloud.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you apply over 3 Bleeding, apply !M! Poison for every 3 Bleeding.

NL Charged: Consume !AM! ammo to deal !D! damage. Damage increased by !M! for every 2 Freeze on the enemy. NL Charge: Gain max ammo and !B! Block. NL ( !AM! / !MAM! )
